title: Bloomberg Markets: Manges Sees `Smooth Sailing' for Muni Market
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Manges Sees `Smooth Sailing' for Muni Market
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Hardy Manges Head of Municipal Dealer Sales MarketAxess Discussing the outlook for muni bond investing. Oliver Renick, Bloomberg News Stocks Reporter, also participates in the discussion.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
